item.title: Remove
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“cocoa, post:2, topic:383221”]1) I’m not sure if a tutorial to load 604 emotes has been released but if it has then look for how to load the header of 604 animations and it’ll tell you how to do the rest

2)This is server-side editing. It’s just editing a string place on the quest interface.

  1. To change the theme of the client you have to change it in your class that handles your Jframe which is either titled Gui, EGUI, or Jframe.

  2. Look up a tutorial

  3. Again, tutorials everywhere for this.

  4. Tutorials…

  5. Server-side edit. Tutorials for this as well.

I’m not even going to finish answering because it has become increasingly obvious that you haven’t even searched for ways to do this. Everything you want done has a tutorial published on how to do it. Please use the search bar first before posting a help thread.[/quote]
I wouldnt have asked any of these if i had a tutorial. i searched for one for each of these. there was no result

Read full topic

item.title: Remove

item.description:
@cocoa wrote:

  1. I’m not sure if a tutorial to load 604 emotes has been released but if it has then look for how to load the header of 604 animations and it’ll tell you how to do the rest

2)This is server-side editing. It’s just editing a string place on the quest interface.

  1. To change the theme of the client you have to change it in your class that handles your Jframe which is either titled Gui, EGUI, or Jframe.

  2. Look up a tutorial

  4. Tutorials…

  5. Server-side edit. Tutorials for this as well.

I’m not even going to finish answering because it has become increasingly obvious that you haven’t even searched for ways to do this. Everything you want done has a tutorial published on how to do it. Please use the search bar first before posting a help thread.
